body:
Hey there, I'm Felicity! :D

I'm not that new in terms of playing on the server, but I thought I'd start being active on the forums!

Oh, a bit about me... ermm friends/family, internet, food and reality tv are my life <3 I know, so original

Anyways, I love meeting new people so I'm looking forward to get to know y'all better! (I don't bite) So yeah hi :D
body_tagged:

replies.body: Welcome to the Avicus forums! If you have any questions or concerns about anything whether that be Avicus related or has to do with real life situations, I'm here to help if you need it. Think of the staff team as not only Moderators, but the ones here to support you in anything you need. So, enjoy your time with us! :D
